hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the release (e.g. Hoxton.RELEASE). Will correspond to the properties file (e.g. hoxton_release.properties)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_CONFIG_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Root of the URL where the RAW version of the configuration file is present

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_CONFIG_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch, where the RAW version of the configuration file is present

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_META_RELEASE_GIT_ORG_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL of the organization from which projects can be cloned

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: START_FROM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Project name from which you'd like to start the meta-release process. E.g. spring-cloud-sleuth

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TASK_NAMES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Comma separated list of project names. E.g. spring-cloud-sleuth,spring-cloud-contract

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DRY_RUN
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will run meta-release in a dry run mode

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_SAGAN_UPDATE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update documentation repository with the current URL

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_DOCUMENTATION_REPOS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update documentation repository with the current URL

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_SPRING_PROJECTS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update Project Sagan with the current release train values

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_RELEASE_TRAIN_WIKI
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update the release train wiki page with the current release train values

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_RUN_UPDATED_SAMPLES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update samples and run the the build

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_ALL_TEST_SAMPLES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update samples with bumped snapshots after release

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_RELEASE_TRAIN_DOCS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update the release train documentation project and run the generation

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_SPRING_GUIDES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update the release train documentation project and run the generation

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_START_SPRING_IO
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update start.spring.io

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_GITHUB_MILESTONES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If true then will update milestones on Github for each project

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_POST_RELEASE_ONLY
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If set to true will run only post release tasks

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_META_RELEASE_RELEASE_TRAIN_PROJECT_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the project that represents the BOM of the release train

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_META_RELEASE_RELEASE_TRAIN_DEPENDENCY_NAMES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: All the names of dependencies that should be updated with the release train project version

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_GIT_RELEASE_TRAIN_BOM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Subfolder of the pom that contains the versions for the release train

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_POM_THIS_TRAIN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: URL to a project containing a BOM. Defaults to Spring Cloud Release Git repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASER_PROJECTS_TO_SKIP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Names of projects to skip deployment for meta-release

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -o errexit
echo "Logging to Dockerhub..." docker login -p "$DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD" -u "$DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME"

#!/bin/bash set -o errexit if [[ "${RELEASE_VERSION}" == "" || "${RELEASE_VERSION}" == """" ]]; then echo "
YOU MUST PASS THE VERSION OF THE META-RELEASE!!!
" fi echo "
RUNNING THE [${RELEASE_VERSION}] META-RELEASE!!!
"
set +x git config user.name "spring-buildmaster" git config user.email "buildmaster@springframework.org" git config credential.helper "store --file=/tmp/gitcredentials" echo "https://$GITHUB_REPO_USERNAME:$GITHUB_REPO_PASSWORD@github.com" > /tmp/gitcredentials export SPRING_CLOUD_STATIC_REPO="https://$GITHUB_REPO_USERNAME:$GITHUB_REPO_PASSWORD@github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-static.git" trap "{ rm -f /tmp/gitcredentials; }" EXIT set -x
version=$( echo "$RELEASE_VERSION" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr '.' '_' ) configFile="${version}.properties" configUrl="${RELEASER_CONFIG_URL}/${RELEASER_CONFIG_BRANCH}/${configFile}" echo "Downloading the configuration properties file from [${configUrl}]" rm -rf config && mkdir -p config && curl --fail "${configUrl}" -o config/application.properties echo "Cause nobody remembers to set the releaser branch properly, I'll do it for you" if [[ $version == *"hoxton"* ]]; then echo "You're using the Hoxton release train, I'm switching the releaser branch [$RELEASER_BRANCH] to [1.0.x] !" RELEASER_BRANCH="1.0.x" fi
echo "Checking out the branch [$RELEASER_BRANCH]" git checkout "$RELEASER_BRANCH" mkdir -p target ROOT_VIEW="Spring%20Cloud" CURRENT_VIEW="Releaser" LOGS_FILE=".git/releaser.log" echo "Building the releaser, please wait... If the build fails after this then it means that the releaser failed to get built. Then please check the build's workspace under [.git/releaser.log] for logs. You can click here to see it [${JENKINS_URL}/view/${ROOT_VIEW}/view/${CURRENT_VIEW}/job/${JOB_NAME}/ws/${LOGS_FILE}]" ./mvnw clean install -DskipTests -am -pl :spring-cloud > "${LOGS_FILE}" set +x export SPRING_CLOUD_STATIC_REPO_DESTINATION="$( dirname "$(mktemp)" )/" SPRING_CLOUD_RELEASE_REPO="https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-release.git" SYSTEM_PROPS="-Dgpg.secretKeyring="$FOO_SEC" -Dgpg.publicKeyring="$FOO_PUB" -Dgpg.passphrase="$FOO_PASSPHRASE" -DSONATYPE_USER="$SONATYPE_USER" -DSONATYPE_PASSWORD="$SONATYPE_PASSWORD"" if [[ ${START_FROM} != "" ]]; then START_FROM_OPTS="--start-from '${START_FROM}'" fi if [[ ${TASK_NAMES} != "" ]]; then TASK_NAMES_OPTS="--task-names '${TASK_NAMES}'" fi
echo "Start from opts [${START_FROM_OPTS}], task names [${TASK_NAMES_OPTS}]" echo "Run the meta-releaser!" java -Dreleaser.git.username="$GITHUB_REPO_USERNAME" \ -Dreleaser.git.password="$GITHUB_REPO_PASSWORD" \ -jar projects/spring-cloud/target/spring-cloud*SNAPSHOT.jar --releaser.post-release-tasks-only=${RELEASER_POST_RELEASE_ONLY} --releaser.meta-release.release-train-project-name=${RELEASER_META_RELEASE_RELEASE_TRAIN_PROJECT_NAME} --releaser.meta-release.release-train-dependency-names="${RELEASER_META_RELEASE_RELEASE_TRAIN_DEPENDENCY_NAMES}" --releaser.meta-release.projects-to-skip="${RELEASER_PROJECTS_TO_SKIP}" --releaser.git.release-train-bom-url=${RELEASER_GIT_RELEASE_TRAIN_BOM} --releaser.pom.this-train-bom=${RELEASER_POM_THIS_TRAIN} --releaser.maven.wait-time-in-minutes=180 --releaser.maven.system-properties="${SYSTEM_PROPS}" --interactive=false --meta-release=true --dry-run=${DRY_RUN} --releaser.sagan.update-sagan=${RELEASER_SAGAN_UPDATE} --releaser.git.update-documentation-repo=${RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_DOCUMENTATION_REPOS} --releaser.git.update-spring-project=${RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_SPRING_PROJECTS} --releaser.git.update-release-train-wiki=${RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_RELEASE_TRAIN_WIKI} --releaser.git.run-updated-samples=${RELEASER_GIT_RUN_UPDATED_SAMPLES} --releaser.git.update-all-test-samples=${RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_ALL_TEST_SAMPLES} --releaser.git.update-release-train-docs=${RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_RELEASE_TRAIN_DOCS} --releaser.git.update-spring-guides=${RELEASER_GIT_UPDATE_SPRING_GUIDES} --full-release ${START_FROM_OPTS} ${TASK_NAMES_OPTS} || exit 1 rm -rf /tmp/gitcredentials
